name: Strategic Social Engineering
description: Using advanced social engineering tactics to counteract and expose PSNs.

cards.title: Reversing Social Manipulation
cards.description: Turning PSN influence strategies against them to erode their control.
bulletpoints: Use deceptive compliance—act agreeable while subtly undermining their agenda.
Encourage their overconfidence by feeding them misleading affirmations.
Trap them in self-contradictions by subtly altering their previous statements.
cards.summaryText: Play along visibly while sabotaging their plans under the surface, puff up their ego with fake validation to breed arrogance, and tweak their own words to box them into contradictions they can't escape.

cards.title: Disrupting PSN Psychological Frameworks
cards.description: Targeting the mental foundations PSNs rely on to maintain control.
bulletpoints: PSNs require constant validation—starving them of attention weakens their influence.
Present logical paradoxes to disrupt their narrative control over subordinates.
Encourage division among PSN members by subtly implying betrayals within their ranks.
cards.summaryText: Cut their validation supply to drain their power, drop logic traps that scramble their story and confuse followers, and whisper hints of betrayal that fracture their unity from within.

cards.title: Sabotaging PSN Influence Networks
cards.description: Disrupting the social networks that allow PSNs to maintain dominance.
bulletpoints: Isolate key enablers by encouraging doubt in their authority figures.
Create controlled conflicts that expose PSNs' hypocrisy to their followers.
Foster alternative leadership structures that reduce PSN dependency.
cards.summaryText: Cut off enablers by seeding doubts about the bosses they prop up, engineer visible conflicts that reveal hypocrisy to believers, and build rival power structures that offer an exit from PSN control.
